name: Ascent Accessory for Freestyle2 Ergonomic Keyboard
short_description: The Ascent accessory enables tenting of the Freestyle2 keyboard from 20 to 90 degrees (in 10 degree increments)
Tenting reduces forearm tension to improve typing comfort
Use the Ascent to achieve vertical typing
Freestyle2 keyboard sold separately
Solid metal construction (made in the USA)

name: R-Go Split Keyboard, Scissors Mechanism, Anti Carpal Tunnel, 2 Part Ergonomic Design with Break Software, Ultra-Thin, QWERTY (US) Layout, Bluetooth 5.0, Compatible with Windows/MacOS, White
short_description: Ergonomic split keyboard: This split keyboard consists of 2 separate parts. This way you can always type with straight wrists and prevent pinching of tendons and blood vessels. The R-Go Split can be turned into a compact keyboard with a magnet

With break software: Prevent complaints by taking regular breaks. This anti carpal tunnel keyboard has patented Break software and indicates with LED colors when it is time to take a break. This Break software won the 2021 Benelux Office Award

Thin keyboard & Light keystroke: The keyboard is thin to avoid pinching of blood vessels and tendons. The special scissor mechanism in the keys ensures a light keystroke for more typing comfort. You can easily take the Split with you
Made with respect for the environment: R-Go Tools keyboards are made of recycled plastic and Aluminum and come in plastic-free packaging

Compatible: Simply connect this multi-device keyboard via Bluetooth 5.0 connection. Easily switch between 3 devices. Rechargeable with USB C (with USB A converter) and works with PC/desktop/laptop and Windows/Mac
SKU CODE: RGOSBUSWLWH

name: Split Ergonomic Mechanical Keyboard, Powered by QMK, Keyboard Comes Fully Assembled with MX Switch Support, 36-Key Layout, USB-C Connectivity, 28 Extra Keycaps & Switches Included
short_description: 『 ADVANCED / ENTHUSIAST KEYBOARD – NOT FOR BEGINNERS 』
『 Hot-Swappable 』Easily change your switches between wireless freedom and wired reliability, ensuring seamless performance for any task or setup
『 Dynamic RGB Lighting 』Personalize your keyboard with vibrant per-key RGB lighting, enhancing aesthetics and visibility in low-light environments
『 QMK Firmware 』Fully programmable QMK firmware allows for custom key mapping, macros, and shortcuts to boost your productivity and creativity

『 Express Your Style 』This keyboard comes with a large assortment of extra 28 keycaps. Put these right where you want them to create your own look and fit your personal layout. This helps with mastering the board, too
『 Ergonomic Split Layout 』Experience ultimate comfort with a compact 36-key design that promotes natural hand positioning, comes fully assembled and keeps your workspace tidy.

name: Cloud Nine ErgoTKL Ergonomic Tenkeyless Mechanical Keyboard for PC – Kailh Brown – TKL RGB Backlit Ergo Split Key Board
short_description: Split Keyboard Design – Separates Up To 6.5 Inches (16.5 cm) to help eliminate wrist and shoulder pain while you type. Keeps hands and arms properly separated and helps provide pain-free typing for 8+ hours a day.
Tented Palm Support – Includes built in side slope (7 degrees) keeping hands comfortable at their natural inward angle (no separate tenting kit required).
Aluminum Smart Wheel – Easily control volume, switch applications, scroll web pages, and more. Assign a custom function or color using the included app.

Kailh Switches – Professional grade mechanical switches provide a super-long life and satisfying typing experience. Switches are fully backlit and easy to read. Customize the backlight color or choose from a pre-programmed light flow.

For Work and Play – Features programmable Hotkeys, a USB Pass-Through port, and extra "M" keycaps. Whether writing emails, coding, or gaming, the ErgoTKL helps you do it with more comfort & efficiency.
Works with Standing Desks – Adjustable forward tilt ( 0 / -4 / -7 degrees) keeps hands supported while sitting or standing.
product_details: Best Sellers Rank #1,117 in Computer Keyboards

name: AXIS-TILT N52 Magnetic Split Keyboard Stand (Set of 2), Stepless 0-60° Adjustable Aluminum Tenting Kit, Ergonomic Keyboard Riser Compatible with Corne, Ergodox, Moonlander (Black)
short_description: ULTRA-STRONG N52 MAGNETIC MOUNT: Equipped with industrial-grade N52 Neodymium magnets, AXIS-TILT provides a rock-solid, instantaneous snap-on connection. We even include premium adhesive metal rings to ensure universal compatibility with non-magnetic keyboard cases. Experience a secure attachment that stays firm during intense typing while remaining easy to detach.

VERSATILE PRECISION ADJUSTMENT: Find your "sweet spot" with a stepless 0-60° tilt and a 360° rotating base that features a satisfying mechanical click feedback. Align your wrists to a more neutral, relaxed angle to significantly reduce forearm tension and wrist strain during marathon coding or gaming sessions.

PREMIUM MATTE ANODIZED ALUMINUM: Experience a high-end touch that matches your professional workstation. Crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum with a sophisticated sandblasted finish, AXIS-TILT offers a scratch-resistant metallic texture that is both fingerprint-proof and built to last for years.

ROCK-SOLID STABILITY: The entire base is reinforced with a high-density, full-coverage anti-slip pad that grips any desk surface with immense friction. Whether you're a heavy-handed typist or a fast-paced gamer, your setup stays exactly where you want it without a millimeter of wobble.

UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY & BUILT-IN TOOL: Designed for enthusiasts, it fits popular split keyboards like Corne, Ergodox, and Moonlander. Featuring a hidden storage slot for the included Allen key, AXIS-TILT ensures you can make on-the-fly adjustments without ever hunting for tools again.
product_description: ■ AXIS-TILT: THE ENDGAME FOUNDATION FOR SPLIT KEYBOARDS ■ BEYOND A STAND — AN ENGINEERING STATEMENT. Most stands look like office supplies; AXIS-TILT looks like precision laboratory equipment. Transform your Corne or Moonlander setup into a high-tech command center. The matte anodized finish complements custom keycaps and artisan cables with a professional "stealth" look. NATURAL COMFORT: THE ERGONOMIC STORY Standard flat keyboards strain the ulnar nerve. AXIS-TILT allows for Natural Tenting. By lifting your keyboard to a 20°, 40°, or 60° angle, you align your wrists in their natural state, reducing fatigue during long coding sessions. THE SYMPHONY OF MECHANICAL PRECISION The 360° rotating base features high-tolerance ball bearings that provide a rhythmic mechanical click feedback. It’s a sensory reminder that you are using a professional tool built to last, not a disposable plastic accessory. STABILITY FOR HEAVY-HANDED TYPISTS N52 Neodymium magnets and a high-friction rubber base create a "locked-in" feel. Your setup won't creep across your desk mat even during high-APM gaming. The magnetic snap-back is instantaneous and confident. THE GEEK’S HIDDEN LUXURY AXIS-TILT features an integrated magnetic tool dock. The Allen key is always hidden in the base, ready for on-the-fly adjustments. It’s this obsession with detail that makes AXIS-TILT the premier choice. ■ SPECIFICATIONS ■ Materials: CNC Anodized Aluminum / N52 Magnets Tilt: 0° to 60° Stepless / 360° Rotation Compatibility: Corne, Ergodox, ZSA Moonlander, Dygma, Glove80 ■ IN THE BOX ■ 2 x AXIS-TILT Units 4 x Adhesive Metal Rings 1 x Allen Key

name: 2PCS Zinc Alloy Mini Foldable Laptop Stand, Portable Computer Keyboard Riser with 2 Adjustable Angles, Self-Adhesive Invisible Notebook Stand and Keyboard Lift for Desk (Black)

name: Nillkin Portable Laptop Stand with 3 Adjustable Angles, Flip Keyboard Riser Feet for Most Keyboards, Computer Keyboard Stand for Desktop, MacBook, HP and Other 10-17 Inches Laptop Feet Riser, Silver
short_description: LAPTOP STAND & KEYBOARD RISE: Design for Laptop and Keyboard, Compatibility with MacBook Pro/Air 13 16, 10-17 inches Surface, Lenovo, Dell, HP, ASUS laptop and most of keyboard

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: 3°,11° and 16° three different angles to adjust, Suitable to different heights of people.Protect your neck and shoulders from pain, Reduce strain on your wrists and arms, improve typing accuracy and comfort

Zinc Alloy Durability & Heat Dissipation: Crafted from premium zinc alloy, triangular support, this stand is sturdy yet lightweight. Its open design enhances air circulation, preventing laptop overheating and ensuring smooth performance

Anti Slip Silicone and Nano Traceless Adhesive: Equipped with upgraded anti slip silicone pads to keep your laptop or keyboard stable while typing. Nano seamless adhesive ensures firm adhesion without residue. Usage tip: It is recommended to let it sit for 1 hour for full adsorption during the first pasting to improve stability, and it is not recommended to repeat pasting too many times (which will affect adhesion)

Ultra Portable & Foldable Design: Compact in size, lightweight, with invisible effect when folded, it won't take up your space and is easy to put in a laptop bag, making it an ideal choice for travel, office or classroom use
PACKAGE CONTENTS: Packaging include 2 PCS Nillkin portable laptop stand - Black
